channel.title: [PI/DSPK] Trade Dupe

item.title: [PI/DSPK] Trade Dupe
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

This is the Trade dupe i have been dealing with for awhile.

When you click on the minimap in trade the other trade window is still open i i tried many things in walking.java

like

If i put that method the guy just can’t walk but the windows still close

[CODE] if(c.inTrade) {
return;

	}[/CODE]

[CODE] if(c.inTrade) {
return;

	}[/CODE]

If i do that one this closes both trades but if you are fast enough to go to the second trade window and accept and then quickly hit the minimap they will both get their items’a back any ideas ?

[CODE] if(c.inTrade) {
c.getTradeAndDuel().declineTrade();

	}[/CODE]

Read full topic
